channel.title: Richsacpe Source Help
channel.description:
i cant figure out how to make it so people can trade and drop items ive look the client.java like 5 times and i cant find it
and i cant figure out to change the starting equipment in the inventory for it and wen i cahnge the starter command and use it in game the client crashes

item.title: Richsacpe Source Help
item.dc:creator: @Ayk_Ayama Ayk Ayama
item.description:
@Ayk_Ayama wrote:

when you change the items of the starter, make sure your changing the items to items that have been added to the client you are using.

Read full topic

item.title: Richsacpe Source Help
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

I know this may sound like just another annoying comment, but sounds to me you need a new source. When you begin coding a source the last thing you want is a bunch of bugs/errors to deal with. You want something you can work with, not something that should of been fixed in the first place.
-Sexy Slay

Read full topic

item.title: Richsacpe Source Help
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

hmm what source are you using ans try typing ::enabletrade and ::enabledrop

Read full topic
